about_text:
Hi! I'm Aaron. I love solving problems, learning and building new things, I tend to always keep an open mind. 

My current focus is computer vision where I have worked on a couple of great projects from a life saving pillbox to a driver distraction tracker. 

I also have experience with full stack web development and cloud computing. This past summer I built a production ready multi-channel ecommerce platform, our current customer has seen a 25% increase in sales in just one month after deployment and 100% increase in six month.
